TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task ResumeAfter<in T>(IDialogContext context, IAwaitable<in T> result);
.class public auto ansi sealed ResumeAfter`1<- T> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ResumeAfter(Of In T)(context As IDialogContext, result As IAwaitable(Of In T)) As Task
type ResumeAfter<'T> = delegate of IDialogContext * IAwaitable<'T> -> Task

Docs.summary: Encapsulates a method that represents the code to execute after a result is available.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the code that will resume after the result is available.
Docs.remarks: The result is often a message from the user.
